titleStmt.title: Tuesday, July 26. 1659. Ordered by Parliament, that Wednesday the 31 of August 1659. be set apart for a day of solemn fasting and humiliation throughout England, Scotland and Ireland. ... Tho. St Nicholas, Clerk of Parliament. Resolved by the Parliament, that this vote be printed, and published in the respective cities, boroughs, towns, parishes and places throughout England, Scotland and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Arms 57a; Steele notation: a and Coun-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
